author: giffels
body:
Hi Alan,

as we discussed in person, this is the hotfix for the DBS pycurl issue with multiple-threads and the updated input validation aka Lexicon.py. It does not depend on https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/382, which we will postpone to the release in March.

Could you review, merge and deploy it, please?

Thanks a lot,
Yuyi & Manuel
title: comp.pre slc5_amd64_gcc461 dbs3 dbs3-client dbs3-migration dbs3-pycurl-client
